channel.title: Compiler problem
channel.description:
When i compile my client it shows

item.title: Compiler problem
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

try these it saying its can’t find javac thats because your enviromental variables are not set

Client code: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\java.exe" *.java pause

Source compiler:

@echo off :build cls "C:\Program Files (x86) \Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\java.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\clip\*.java src\server\clip\region\*.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problem
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:8, topic:431341”][quote author=lemme_winks_ link=topic=534020.msg3904575#msg3904575 date=1328104824]
all of you are completely retarded. you need to set your sourcepath or cd into it.
[/quote]

in that way you just could tell me how to fix it…[/quote]

if you knew the basics of DOS or your system’s native terminal then you should have no problem understanding what i meant when i said cd into it; and if you knew what this was: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/tooldocs/windows/javac.html or cared to ever look at a reference sheet for it you should have no problem understanding what i meant when i told you to set your sourcepath.

i assume you are on windows…obvious reasons

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problem
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

[quote=“leonscape, post:5, topic:431341”]@echo offTitle Compiler"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\javac.exe" *.javapause
or you do

@echo offTitle Compiler"C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\YOUR VERSION OF JDK\IF IN BIN CHANGE TO (bin)\javac.exe" *.javapause

hope i helpped[/quote]

It says same error, i mean maby i can use other client, but i need with new maps, not like in all PI based 317 servers (ersedpkz, hybridpvp, corruptionx or something,)

Read full topic
